party_a_name.description: Full legal name of the first party

party_b_name.description: Full legal name of the second party

effective_date.description: Date on which the agreement becomes effective, in ISO format YYYY-MM-DD if possible

term_length.description: Length of the agreement term in months, if determinable

governing_law.description: Jurisdiction whose laws govern the agreement (e.g. 'England and Wales')

termination_notice_days.description: Number of days of notice required to terminate for convenience, if specified

liability_cap.description: Monetary cap on liability, expressed as text (e.g. '12 months of Fees')

non_solicit_clause_present.description: Whether there is a non-solicitation clause

data_transfer_outside_uk_eu.description: Whether the agreement explicitly allows data transfer outside the UK/EU

risk_level.description: High-level risk rating from the perspective of a small SaaS vendor

risk_explanation.description: Short natural-language explanation (2â€“4 sentences) of why the risk level was chosen
